home.topBlockTitle: Invest with Purpose, Invest for the Future
home.topBlockText: Make a positive impact and achieve long-term financial success by investing in sustainable and socially responsible companies throughout Europe.
home.secondBlockText: At Baltvesta, we are passionate about driving growth and profitability for our portfolio companies, and delivering exceptional returns for our investors. Since 2001, we have been investing in high-potential companies throughout Europe, and actively participating in their development to unlock their full potential.

0.title: Industry Expertise
0.text: Deep industry expertise with a current focus in metal processing and real estate, allowing identification of high-potential companies and maximizing their potential.

1.title: Strategic Partnership
1.text: Collaborative approach to investing, working closely with portfolio companies executives to provide strategic guidance and operational support.

2.title: Exceptional Returns
2.text: Dedicated to delivering exceptional returns with integrity, transparency, and a long-term investment approach.

home.thirdBlockTitle:
Building the Future Through
Strategic Investments: Our
Areas of Expertise

0.cardTitle: Investing in the Future of Metal Processing
0.cardText: We believe in the importance of technological innovation and sustainable practices in the metal processing industry. Our investments aim to support companies that share these values and strive to achieve excellence in their field.
0.operatingBusiness: Umega Group, an international group of companies dedicated to technological innovation and sustainable practices in the metal industry.

1.cardTitle: Shaping and Upholding a Real Estate Future Rooted in Sustainable Principles
1.cardText: Our investments in commercial real estate aim to promote sustainable and innovative approaches to construction and urban development. Our unwavering commitment involves generating sustained value for our investors and fostering the betterment of local communities.
1.operatingBusiness: We own 2 commercial properties and we are currently running two commercial real estate development projects to expand our portfolio and maximize returns.

home.fourthBlockTitle:
Looking Back at Our Successful Investments:
The Story Behind the Numbers

0.title: Pharmacy
0.text: Investing in life-saving drugs and therapies through innovative pharmaceutical companies.

1.title: Real estate
1.text: Investing in sustainable and profitable commercial real estate properties for stable returns.

2.title: Financial services
2.text: Investing in innovative and responsible financial services companies for evolving customer needs.

about.topBlockDescription:
At Baltvesta, we are driven by a passion to achieve long-term growth and
development through strategic investments and partnerships.
about.secondBlockText: Our story began with a passion for investing and a commitment to creating value for our stakeholders. Founded in Lithuania, we have since expanded our reach to other European countries, bringing our expertise and experience to diverse markets. Our success is rooted in our disciplined investment approach, which emphasizes long-term value creation and careful risk management.
about.thirdBlockTitle:
From Our Roots to the Present:
Our Journey in Investing

0.title: Baltvesta founded
0.text: The company was established with a vision of identifying exceptional investment opportunities; first investment made.

1.title: First investment
1.text: Baltvesta embarks on its journey with its initial investment in the promising pharmaceutical company Sanitas.

2.title: First metal processing investments
2.text: Baltvesta advanced its position by venturing into Utenos Elektrotechnika, a company renowned for its expertise in metal processing. This significant step marked the foundation of its present investment strategy. Further bolstering its commitment to the metal processing sector, Baltvesta extended its investments to include the Umega group.

3.title: Expansion of investments
3.text: Additional acquisitions were pursued, encompassing Umega Group (Lithuania) as well as Sanitas (Slovakia, Poland).

4.title: Growth through real estate
4.text: Ongoing real estate transactions took place in Lithuania, Bulgaria (2006), and Georgia (2007).

5.title: Investments into finance sector
5.text: Venturing into a microfinance enterprise in Georgia broadens both the investment portfolio and geographic reach.

6.title: Sanitas was divested
6.text: It was the largest transaction in the Baltics in 2011.

7.title: Strategic focus â€“ metal processing & real estate
7.text: Baltvesta remains committed to its investments in the metal processing industry, with the acquisition of a controlling interest in Umega Group signaling a strategic priority.

8.title: Expansion into new markets
8.text: Gaining prominence for its achievements, Baltvesta extended its investment ventures from Lithuania to encompass various other European nations.

about.fourthBlockTitle: Disciplined investment approach that is rooted in our core principles of integrity, transparency, and long-term value creation.

0.title: Disciplined Approach
0.text: Our disciplined approach focuses on long-term value creation by investing in fundamentally sound businesses and partnering with portfolio companies to drive growth and profitability.

1.title: Sector Expertise
1.text: With a deep understanding of the metal processing and real estate industries, we leverage our sector expertise to identify attractive investment opportunities and create value through active participation in portfolio companies.

2.title: Risk Management
2.text: Our approach to risk management is founded on a rigorous due diligence process, appropriate financial structuring, and active monitoring of investments to identify and mitigate potential risks.

3.title: Focus on Sustainability
3.text: We believe that sustainable investments are key to long-term value creation, and as such, we prioritize investments in companies that demonstrate a commitment to environmental, social, and governance (ESG) principles.

0.cardTitle: Investing in the Future of Metal Processing
0.cardText: We believe in the importance of technological innovation and sustainable practices in the metal processing industry. Our investments aim to support companies that share these values and strive to achieve excellence in their field.

1.cardTitle: Building a Sustainable Future for Real Estate
1.cardText: Our investments in commercial real estate aim to promote sustainable and innovative approaches to construction and urban development. We are committed to creating long-term value for our investors, while contributing to the well-being of local communities.

0.title: Investing in the Future of Metal Processing
0.text:
International group of companies dedicated to technological innovation and sustainable practices in the metal industry.

With roots reaching as far back as 1919, the group are full scope specialists in industrial metal: from carrying out R&D to providing processing services and building a range of proprietary products for industrial and agricultural customers.
unique production facilities in Lithuania and Germany

exits.topBlockTitle: Looking Back at Our Successful Investments: The Story Behind the Numbers

0.title: Sanitas
0.text:
Engaging in investments that contribute to the advancement of life-saving drugs and therapies through innovative pharmaceutical enterprises.

In 2003 together with business partners invested in Sanitas, generic pharmaceutical manufacturer. Subject to restructuring of management, good manufacturing practice (GMP) certificate and acquisition of companies in Slovakia and Poland, Sanitas grown about 10 times and became a significant player in the Central and Eastern European market.

Sold in 2011 to Valeant Pharmaceuticals International

1.title: Credit Plus Georgia
1.text: In 2009 Baltvesta along with its partners invested in a microfinance business, whose loan portfolio was later on sold to JSC Credo Bank, Georgia in 2018.

2.title: Real estate
2.text:
